title: vEronrum ariyEn
sahitya:
vEronrum ariyEn kaDavuLE vinai onrum kuriyEn


anupallavi

  nIyonru nAn unnil onru nilavulagun kOyil enru
tUya ninaivum shollum sheyalum tUya vAzhvum toDarndadanri


caraNam    paDippariyEn kELviyariyEn paNDitargaLai kaNDariyEn
tuDikkum uLLam turiya sabhai nI tuLLiyADum vaLLal enrapin
